Tools I Use

Some of my work

Forecast Deck

  • Purpose: To save specific locations to your deck, to pull and display the current and future forecast for that location on demand.

  • Use: A favorite button in a weather app would be convenient for any traveler, such as truckers. Having saved locations keeps memory of routes they would pass through giving advanced warning of harsh conditions.

  • How?: I access the weather through latitude and longitude via the weatherio API, and use a reverseGeocode API to generate the latitude and longitude. For saving favorites, I utilize the localStorage API to keep it lean, fast and the singlepage user experience seamless.

Flash It!

  • Purpose: To be a swift and effective single page study app.

  • Use: Flash it! Is meant to be quick and effective, single-page application for the needs of basic memorization. You can save any number of question answer pairs into a deck of flashcards, and access them as you see fit via the navbar.

  • How?: React was chosen as the foundation for this project since it is best suited to single-page applications. Firebase is used as a database for the user, and localStorage is used to accelerate the user experience and reduce load times.
